title: Bard's ult and team channeled abilities,
body:
Blue team Karthus uses his ultimate, during the channel/cast time, blue team bard, uses his ultimate on blue team Karthus, does Karthus's ult:

A. stop casting, and mana/cd is refunded 

B. stop casting, and mana/cd is NOT refunded 

C. continues casting even while in stasis

D. pause while in stasis and continue casting after stasis has ended

Can i have someone who knows the correct answer please say, (Preferebly someone with credibility like RIOT)

replies.body:
It's C) the ult keeps on going. Karthus' ultimate doesn't work on a "if there's available champions then you can use the ultimate" like Morgana's ultimate does. Technically you aren't targeting anyone directly. And for that reason, it wouldn't cancel the cast/channel. 

Think of bards ult like a AoE Zhonya's. Everyone hit by Bards Ultimate becomes untargetable, and all incoming damage is negated regardless of whether or not it was a skill shot, AA, DoT, AoE or auto-target ability. How would Karthus' Ultimate usually work on someone who Zhonya'd?
You seem to have misunderstood. Karthus is the one being targeted by Bard's ultimate in this scenario.

it won't refund it. but the question is does it affect him whilst his passive is active?

I'd say it's most likely to cancel and not refund (A), that's what usually happens with similar types of CC (pretty sure it's basically the interaction as between Zhonya's and Karthus' ult). The obvious exception, if Karthus is in passive form it wouldn't affect him.
I'm 99% sure it'll just cancel his ult w/o refunding mana.
either A or B from what I've read.
